description:
Setsu, Ruri, and Levia arrive on the demonic continent. They reconnect with old acquaintances and are swept up in a sinister plot involving the Demon Lord and a mysterious merchant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Frying a Squid for a Second Time
Ika o Ageru no wa Nidome Desu
Je fais frire un calamar pour la deuxième fois
イカを揚げるのは二度目です
